name: Match Girl
description:
Match Girl v1.02
by DDRKirby(ISQ) and Kat Jia

Soundtrack download

Match Girl was made in 72 hours for round 28 of Ludum Dare. The theme was "You Only Get One", so we made a 2D platformer with dynamic lighting and a darkness mechanic where you can only see a level once by using a single match. Probably the "cleanest" and most solid Ludum Dare team entry we've done.

Awards (out of 780 jam entries):

  • #2 in Overall
  • #2 in Audio
  • #4 in Fun
  • #8 in Theme

Current world records:
Normal Mode - 3:23:34 by DDRKirby(ISQ) (video)
Hard Mode - 4:36:32 by DDRKirby(ISQ)
Also see a former Hard Mode record video - 5:14:46 by DDRKirby(ISQ)
